projects.title: Psychooncology Conversational AI for local Indian languages
projects.description: A sophisticated conversational AI assistant named "Anna" designed to provide psychological support for cancer patients and their families. Built with Next.js, the system features a comprehensive RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) pipeline using Pinecone vector database and integrates with Sarvam.ai's language model for multi-language support across 22 Indian languages. The system includes strict content filtering to avoid medical advice, LangSmith integration for observability, and rate limiting with fallback to Anthropic Claude when needed.
projects.heroImageAlt: Psychooncology Conversational AI for local Indian languages screenshot

projects.title: MedHub Ecosystem - Medical Platform Suite
projects.description: A comprehensive ecosystem of interconnected medical platforms designed to serve the entire healthcare workflow. The MedHub suite includes specialized applications for customer relationship management (CRM), social networking among healthcare professionals, AI-powered assistance, and environmental health monitoring. Built with modern web technologies and AI integration, these platforms work together to create a unified healthcare technology environment.

projects.title: BurnOut Assistant - Tech Worker Mental Health
projects.description: An open-source AI-powered mental health platform specifically designed to address burnout issues among technology professionals and healthcare workers. The system provides personalized therapeutic support, burnout assessment tools, and evidence-based intervention strategies tailored to the unique stressors and challenges faced by people working in high-stress technical environments. Built with accessibility, privacy, and professional-grade mental health support as core principles.

projects.title: AGI Detector - Emergence Monitoring System
projects.description: A sophisticated early-warning system that monitors the AI landscape for genuine indicators of Artificial General Intelligence development. The system features multi-source crawling across 7 major AI sources (OpenAI, DeepMind, Anthropic, Microsoft AI, arXiv, TechCrunch, VentureBeats), GPT-4.1-mini powered analysis for cost-effective detection, and real-time alerts with severity classification. Includes advanced web crawling with Playwright automation, cross-validation systems, and comprehensive trend visualization with historical tracking.

projects.title: Agentic Design - Autonomous Creative Framework
projects.description: A revolutionary framework for autonomous creative content generation that breaks free from typical AI aesthetics and generic patterns. Utilizing LionAGI and SPARC (Strategic Planning and Reasoning Capabilities) methodology, this system creates unique image and video prompts that avoid the homogenized look commonly associated with AI-generated content. The framework emphasizes originality, cultural authenticity, and creative diversity while maintaining professional quality and artistic coherence.

projects.title: BDS Automation - Utility Company Workflow
projects.description: A sophisticated n8n automation workflow designed for Severn Trent Water to process Big Difference Scheme (BDS) applications automatically. The system handles customer data validation, discount calculations based on income thresholds, database operations, and comprehensive audit logging. Features advanced error handling, real-time notifications, and seamless integration with existing utility company systems.

projects.title: Multi-Agent Customer Service System
projects.description: An intelligent customer service system built with Flowise featuring specialized AI agents that automatically route customer inquiries to the appropriate specialist. The system includes a condition agent that analyzes customer intent and seamlessly hands off conversations to refund agents, sales agents, or general support agents. Designed for Blinds2Go with advanced natural language processing and contextual understanding.

projects.title: Weather-Based Marketing Automation
projects.description: An intelligent marketing automation system that monitors Met Office weather warnings and automatically generates targeted social media content. The system specializes in creating water conservation messaging during heat waves, combining real-time weather data with contextual water-saving tips and regional alerts. Features sophisticated content generation, duplicate prevention, and multi-platform distribution capabilities.

projects.title: PWA News Reader - Modern Offline App
projects.description: A sophisticated Progressive Web App news reader featuring offline reading capabilities, smooth Framer Motion animations, and a native app-like experience. The application includes real RSS feed integration, comprehensive PWA features (install to home screen, background sync, push notifications), and advanced UI with dark/light themes. Built with modern React patterns and optimized for performance with <500KB bundle size and <3s load time.

projects.title: YelloAI - AI-Powered Directory Service
projects.description: A sophisticated directory and search platform that combines traditional business directory functionality with AI-powered recommendations and intelligent search capabilities. Built with a database-centric architecture utilizing PostgreSQL's advanced features including PLpgSQL stored procedures for complex business logic. The platform leverages artificial intelligence to provide personalized recommendations, semantic search, and intelligent categorization of business listings and services.

projects.title: PropWise - AI Property Intelligence
projects.description: Comprehensive property analysis platform that leverages AI vision technology to generate detailed reports from satellite and street-level imagery. Features multi-view property analysis, bilingual support (English/Hungarian), interactive controls for image manipulation, and editable AI-generated reports. Integrates multiple Google Maps APIs with GPT-4 Vision for professional property assessment, providing real estate professionals with actionable insights for investment decisions and market analysis.

projects.title: Blinds2Go - E-commerce Platform Enhancement
projects.description: A comprehensive enhancement of the Blinds2Go e-commerce platform specializing in custom window treatments and blinds. The project includes advanced product customization tools, AI-powered customer service integration, intelligent search and filtering capabilities, and sophisticated measurement and installation guidance systems. Built with modern e-commerce best practices, the platform provides a seamless customer experience from product discovery to installation support.

projects.title: Transcribe7Sec - Ultra-Fast Audio Processing
projects.description: A specialized audio transcription service optimized for processing short audio clips within 7 seconds. The system prioritizes speed and accuracy for real-time applications, making it ideal for voice notes, quick voice commands, meeting snippets, and instant messaging voice replies. Built with advanced speech recognition models and optimized processing pipelines to deliver transcription results in near real-time.

projects.title: DXF Analyzer - CAD File Intelligence
projects.description: A specialized analysis tool for DXF (Drawing eXchange Format) files that automatically extracts meaningful information from technical drawings and CAD files. The system provides automated feature recognition, dimensional analysis, architectural plan interpretation, and intelligent insights from engineering drawings. Designed for architects, engineers, and construction professionals who need to quickly analyze and understand complex technical drawings.

projects.title: Curato AI News - Intelligent Aggregation
projects.description: An AI-powered news aggregation and curation platform that intelligently collects, analyzes, and presents news from thousands of sources worldwide. The system uses advanced natural language processing to provide personalized news recommendations, content quality scoring, bias detection, and intelligent filtering. Designed to cut through information overload and deliver relevant, high-quality news content tailored to individual preferences and interests.

projects.title: Review Analyser - B2B Intelligence Platform
projects.description: A sophisticated business intelligence platform that analyzes customer reviews and feedback at scale using advanced swarm-based architecture. The system processes thousands of reviews from multiple sources to provide actionable insights, sentiment analysis, competitive intelligence, and customer experience optimization recommendations. Built specifically for B2B companies looking to understand customer sentiment and market positioning through comprehensive review data analysis.

projects.title: Neural Design - AI-Driven Interface System
projects.description: An experimental design system that applies neural network principles to user interface design, creating dynamic, adaptive interfaces that evolve based on user interaction patterns. The system features AI-driven layout optimization, adaptive components that learn from user behavior, and neural network-inspired visual patterns. This represents a new paradigm in interface design where the UI becomes an intelligent, learning system rather than a static presentation layer.

projects.title: Social Content Gen - MCP Platform
projects.description: An advanced social media content generation and scheduling platform utilizing Model Context Protocol (MCP) for content search, generation, and visual asset creation. The system integrates multiple AI models for content creation and includes sophisticated scheduling capabilities for social media management. Built with modern TypeScript architecture, it provides seamless workflows for content creators and marketing teams to generate, optimize, and distribute content across multiple platforms with AI assistance.

projects.title: Dr. Balsai Medical Applications Suite
projects.description: Complete medical practice management ecosystem including main application, internal video platform, and Hungarian podcast transcript extraction for medical professional content.

projects.title: Oncology Care Management Platform (Onko24)
projects.description: Advanced oncology care management platform with database optimization for large medical datasets, status monitoring, and specialized PDF processing for medical documents.

projects.title: Comprehensive Dental Practice Suite
projects.description: Complete dental practice management ecosystem including VIPDental management system, PerfectSmile monitoring, and specialized analytics for dental practice optimization.

projects.title: MEDHUB-CRM - Medical Customer Relationship Management
projects.description: Advanced CRM system specifically designed for medical practices with patient management, appointment scheduling, and healthcare workflow optimization.

projects.title: MEDHUB-SOCIAL - Medical Professional Social Platform
projects.description: Social networking platform designed for healthcare professionals to collaborate, share knowledge, and connect within the medical community.

projects.title: EliteMed - Elite Medical Services Platform
projects.description: Premium medical services platform designed for high-end healthcare delivery with advanced medical API integrations.

projects.title: MEDHUB-ECO - Environmental Health Platform
projects.description: Ecological and environmental health monitoring platform focusing on environmental factors affecting public health and medical outcomes.

projects.title: MEDHUB-cohere - AI Integration with Cohere Models
projects.description: AI-powered medical platform integration using Cohere language models for advanced natural language processing in healthcare contexts.

projects.title: MEDHUB-cohere-shadcn - Enhanced UI with Shadcn Components
projects.description: Enhanced version of the MedHub Cohere integration featuring modern UI components and improved user experience design.

projects.title: medhub-convos-patient-detection - Patient Conversation Monitoring
projects.description: Advanced AI system for monitoring and analyzing patient conversations to detect health concerns and provide clinical insights.

projects.title: medhub-site - Main MedHub Website
projects.description: Primary website and landing pages for the MedHub ecosystem, showcasing medical services and platform capabilities.

projects.title: medhub3 - Third Generation Platform
projects.description: Latest iteration of the core MedHub platform with modern React architecture and enhanced medical workflow capabilities.

projects.title: convo-monitor-perfectsmile-monitor - Specialized Dental Conversation Monitoring
projects.description: Advanced conversation monitoring system specifically designed for dental practice customer service and patient communication analysis.

projects.title: onko24-anthropicstatus - Oncology Service Status Monitoring
projects.description: Real-time status monitoring system for oncology services ensuring continuous availability and performance tracking.

projects.title: onkodb - Oncology Database Management System
projects.description: Advanced database management system optimized for oncology data with large dataset handling and medical record optimization.

projects.title: onkodb-processed - Processed Oncology Data Management
projects.description: Specialized system for managing processed oncology data with advanced data processing pipelines and analytics capabilities.

projects.title: onkodb-problematic-large-pdfs - Large Medical PDF Processing
projects.description: Specialized tool for processing large and complex PDF documents in medical environments with advanced file handling capabilities.

projects.title: preciz - Medical Precision Diagnostic Tool
projects.description: Advanced precision diagnostic tool with medical device integrations for accurate diagnosis and treatment planning.

projects.title: vipdental - Dental Practice Management System
projects.description: Comprehensive dental practice management application with patient management, appointment scheduling, and dental workflow optimization.

projects.title: open-health - Open Source Health Platform
projects.description: Open source health platform with public APIs and community-driven healthcare tools for broader medical community access.

projects.title: Rheumatology Foundation Conversational AI Platform
projects.description: Specialized website for rheumatology practice with patient portal and medical service information.

projects.title: MedHubAI-NEWSLETTER - Medical AI Newsletter Platform
projects.description: Automated newsletter platform focusing on medical AI developments with content management and email automation capabilities.

projects.title: Chronic_Health_AI - AI-Assisted Chronic Illness Management
projects.description: Comprehensive platform using AI chatbots like Claude and ChatGPT to help track, diagnose, and support recovery from chronic illnesses.

projects.title: Morphic - AI-Powered Search Engine
projects.description: AI-powered search engine with generative UI, intelligent query processing, and advanced result synthesis. Features real-time information gathering and contextual response generation.

projects.title: SPARC Evolution - Advanced Problem-Solving Framework
projects.description: Evolution of the SPARC framework for structured problem-solving with enhanced AI integration, automated analysis, and iterative refinement capabilities.

projects.title: Tersa - Open Source AI Workflow Canvas
projects.description: Open source AI workflow canvas for visual programming and automation, enabling drag-and-drop AI pipeline creation with community contributions.

projects.title: Open NotebookLM - PDF to Podcast Conversion
projects.description: Open source tool for converting PDF documents to podcast-style audio content using advanced AI narration and content structuring.

projects.title: AI Agent Swarm Coordination Platform
projects.description: Advanced multi-agent coordination platform enabling swarm-based architecture for distributed AI processing, intelligent task allocation, and coordinated agent collaboration.

projects.title: Voice-Enabled AI Agent with Deepgram
projects.description: Sophisticated voice-enabled AI agent utilizing Deepgram SDK for real-time speech processing, WebSocket communication, and natural language interaction capabilities.

projects.title: B2B Review Analysis Platform with Swarm Architecture
projects.description: Sophisticated B2B review analysis platform utilizing swarm-based architecture for distributed processing of customer reviews and feedback with Claude Code integration.

projects.title: N8N Water Utility Data Scraping Automation
projects.description: Advanced n8n automation workflow for scraping water utility data from Severn Trent Water and Portsmouth Water, with dedicated landing page for data service marketing.

projects.title: Automation Detector - Bot Detection System
projects.description: Advanced bot and automation detection system with security features, browser fingerprinting, and sophisticated algorithms to identify automated behavior patterns.

projects.title: Gemini Live - Real-time AI Interactions
projects.description: Live Google Gemini AI integration platform with React and WebRTC for real-time AI interactions, conversational interfaces, and dynamic response generation.

projects.title: Modern Astro Blog Template
projects.description: Modern, performant blog template built with Astro featuring static site generation, optimized performance, and modern design patterns for content-focused websites.

projects.description: Complete workflow demonstration showing the conversion from Figma designs to production websites with automated asset extraction and code generation.

projects.title: Nective - Client Platform Suite
projects.description: Comprehensive client platform suite featuring project management, collaboration tools, and integrated business workflows for professional service organizations.

projects.title: Paris Noble - Professional Portfolio Platform
projects.description: Elegant professional portfolio platform with sophisticated branding, responsive design, and content management capabilities for creative professionals.

projects.title: Claude Code Integrations & Extensions
projects.description: Collection of integrations and extensions for Claude Code including workflow automation, template generation, and development productivity enhancements.

projects.title: Audio Transcription & Processing Suite
projects.description: Comprehensive suite of audio transcription tools with multiple AI provider integrations, real-time processing, and advanced audio analysis capabilities.

projects.title: Cold Email Generation with Gemini AI
projects.description: Advanced cold email generation system using Google Gemini AI for personalized outreach, A/B testing, and performance analytics with high conversion optimization.

projects.title: Growth Analytics & Social Intelligence
projects.description: Comprehensive growth analytics platform with social media intelligence, user behavior analysis, and predictive growth modeling for business optimization.

projects.title: Agentic Design - AI Agent UX Patterns
projects.description: Comprehensive UX pattern library specifically designed for AI agent interfaces, featuring conversational UI patterns, progressive disclosure, and trust-building design elements.

projects.description: Collection of modern animation libraries and motion design systems with React integration, micro-interactions, and performance-optimized animations.
